const char *buffer_; size_t buffer_size_; size_t start_; size_t current_; size_t end_; public: CellIterator(const char *buffer, size_t buffer_size, size_t start, size_t end) : buffer_(buffer), buffer_size_(buffer_size), start_(start), current_(start_), end_(end) { } CellIterator &operator++() { current_ += 1; return *this; } Cell operator*() { bool escaped{false}; class Cell cell; cell.buffer_ = buffer_; cell.start_ = current_; cell.end_ = end_; size_t last_quote_location = 0; bool quote_opened = false; for (auto i = current_; i < end_; i++) { current_ = i; if (buffer_[i] == delimiter::value && !quote_opened) { // actual delimiter // end of cell cell.end_ = current_; cell.escaped_ = escaped; return cell; } else { if (buffer_[i] == quote_character::value) { if (!quote_opened) { // first quote for this cell quote_opened = true;
